extendedInfo.description: Listen to your favorite top love songs of all times. Calvin Harris- Whatâs Love Got to Do With It - Tina Turner- When I Fall in Love - Nat King Cole- Woman in Love - Barbra Streisand- You Are So Beautiful - Joe Cocker- You've Lost That Lovin' Feelin' - The Righteous BrothersTo keep this app free, the song videos are from Youtube.  Internet connection is needed to play the videos.This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.
